message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $1050000 for it. Can we discuss further?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $950000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
